pages.text: $(#008cff)The Runestone Dungeon$() can be found throughout The Aurorian, they always spawn along the X and Z axis. And is home to $(#8800ff)The Runestone Dungeon Keeper$()!$(br2)It's recommended to bring a shield, at least Cerulean or Iron armor, and plenty of inventory space for loot!$(br2)Like all the other dungeons in this mod, $(#008cff)The Runestone Dungeon's$() bricks cannot be broken by any pickaxe other than the $(#008cff)Runestone Breaker$().

pages.title: Runestone Key
pages.text: Used to open $(#008cff)Runestone Gates$(). Only found as loot.

pages.name: Runestone Breaker
pages.text: The only pickaxe that can mine $(#008cff)Runestone Dungeon Bricks$(). Can be crafted once you kill the $(#8800ff)The Runestone Dungeon Keeper$() and obtain the $(#008cff)Keeper's Amulet$() twice!
